pr_title: Add Some Entity Equipment Update Packet Mappings

timeline.message: Add Some Entity Equipment Update Packet Mappings

timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_2744 net/minecraft/network/packet/s2c/play/EntityEquipmentUpdateS2CPacket
 	FIELD field_12565 id I
+	FIELD field_25721 equipment Ljava/util/List;

replies.bodyText: I am pretty sure equipment is both plural and singular, as in I have some equipment in the car..
replies.author: TheBrokenRail

replies.bodyText: Hmm, I think we need a way to distinguish that this is a list than a single equipment.
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		ARG 2 equipment
          
          
            
            		ARG 2 equipments
